name: Conquistador v-0.9
description:
Continuation of work on the game "Conquistadors". 

Demo version of the first level of the game.

You are a navigator and a traveler. Your ship is in distress near a small island inhabited by Indians and bloodthirsty skeletons.

You have to explore the area, make friends with local tribes and win the battle with the mad priest - the leader of the army of the dead.

Android and Windows versions are available for download.

The game will be released early next year.
